Body.Content:
To simplify our communications for Microsoft Copilot, Service health and Message center communications related to Microsoft Copilot services purchased through the Microsoft 365 catalog will be published under Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365)./i>

When this will happen:

This will be rolled out to Service health and Message center by the end of March 2024.

How this will affect your organization:

Communications related to future Microsoft Copilot releases in the Microsoft 365 catalog will also be published under the service name Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365). This rollout includes communications related to existing Microsoft Copilot services such as Microsoft Copilot with commercial data protection and Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365.

What you need to do to prepare:

You might consider updating your administrator training and documentation as needed.

Title: Service health and Message center: Microsoft Copilot consolidation
